document.full_text: u.s. startup fusion-io, backed by computing pioneers steve wozniak and michael dell, says it can outwit computer-storage incumbents like emc which have too much invested in old technology.
document.title: wozniak-backed startup challenges storage giants
lines_and_colors: u.s. startup fusion-io, backed by computing pioneers steve wozniak and michael dell, says it can outwit computer-storage incumbents like emc which have too much invested in old technology.
